remarks: Commutative law for double class substitution in a class, with non free variable condition and in inference form.  (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 4-Jun-2019.)
statement:
csbcom2fi.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
csbcom2fi.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
csbcom2fi.3 $e |- [_ A / x ]_ B = C $.
csbcom2fi.4 $e |- [_ A / x ]_ D = E $.
csbcom2fi $p |- [_ A / x ]_ [_ B / y ]_ D = [_ C / y ]_ E $.
$d x y $.
